thread.title: British PM defends Saudi ties during Crown Prince visit

title: British PM defends Saudi ties during Crown Prince visit
text:
British PM defends Saudi ties during Crown Prince visit 7:51pm GMT - 01:55 
British Prime Minister Theresa May said the UK's link with Saudi Arabia has potentially saved the lives of hundreds of people in the UK. But that hasn't stopped protests during the high-profile visit of Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
British Prime Minister Theresa May said the UK's link with Saudi Arabia has potentially saved the lives of hundreds of people in the UK. But that hasn't stopped protests during the high-profile visit of Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman.
